title: Ward counter
body:
Dear riot,

any chance you could do the community a huge favour and add a ward counter into your game, clearly visible to other teammates? 

I ask for this because I'm sick and tired of these kids complaining about supports not warding enough especially when these kids don't even use their own free wards EVER!

At least I'll be able to point to the fact that these kids should never EVER speak unless they have a single clue as to what they're talking about. 

Oh and if you're feeling particularly creative make it so I can click a button to enlarge this ward counter stat to cover their entire screen for a few second just becuase.

Sincerely

Some guy that's tired of dealing with 5-year-olds

replies.body:
I'd suggest putting this over in the **Gameplay & Strategy** board instead.

Precisely because people would harass others over the ward counter, I don't think this is something Riot would want to implement. Once you climb up some more you'll start seeing everyone ward more frequently; no feature is going to make the lowest elo players drop wards if they don't want to anyway.
you sound like a 5 yr old who lacks social skills to convince your allies you've warded
